definition: to be present at a meeting
to attend (an official function)/to be present/to administer/to approach (esp. as administrator)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Lunch is important but being late never makes a good impression.
sentences.chinese: 午飯當然重要，但是遲蒞會給人留下欠好的印象。
